Update： If I start workers this way:

  if FLAGS.job_name == 'ps':
    server.join()
  else:
   # Do training

Instead of connecting to worker each time:

sess = sv.prepare_or_wait_for_session(FLAGS.worker_grpc_url)

I can successfully run the code. Any explanation about this?

body:
Update： If I start workers this way:

```
  if FLAGS.job_name == 'ps':
    server.join()
  else:
   # Do training
```

Instead of connecting to worker each time:

```
sess = sv.prepare_or_wait_for_session(FLAGS.worker_grpc_url)
```

I can successfully run the code. Any explanation about this?
